name: evc
description: Custom theme for Evergreen Valley College Custom Theme.
author: ImageX

scripts.css:compile: node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-magic-importer/dist/cli.js scss/styles.scss -o css && node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-magic-importer/dist/cli.js scss/ie.scss -o css
scripts.scss:lint: npx stylelint scss/*.scss --mw 5 && npx stylelint scss/**/*.scss --mw 5 && npx stylelint scss/**/**/*.scss --mw 5
scripts.scss:lint:fix: npx stylelint scss/*.scss --fix && npx stylelint scss/**/*.scss --fix && npx stylelint scss/**/**/*.scss --fix
scripts.build: npm run scss:lint && npm run css:compile && npm run css:prefix
